description: AI generates description for captured photo
steps: Capture a photo of a scene with visible details
Wait for AI processing (may take 5-15 seconds)
Verify description is relevant to photo content
Verify description uses professional language appropriate for reports

description: AI description identifies damage in photos
steps: Capture photo of damaged property (crack, water damage, etc.)
Verify description identifies type of damage
Verify description notes location/extent of damage
Verify description avoids speculation on cause

description: AI description identifies equipment and assets
steps: Capture photo of equipment or asset
Verify description identifies equipment type if recognizable
Verify description mentions any visible labels/serial numbers

description: User can edit AI-generated description
steps: Generate AI description for a photo
Verify original AI text is not recoverable (privacy)

description: AI transcribes audio recording
steps: Record a voice memo with clear speech
Wait for transcription (time varies by length)

description: AI transcribes video audio track
steps: Navigate to Entry Detail for video
Verify transcription syncs with video timeline (timestamps)

description: User can edit AI transcription
AI generates summary for entire report
steps: Create report with multiple entries (photos, notes, audio)
Verify summary appears at top of report
Verify summary covers key points from all entries
Verify summary is coherent and professional

description: AI summary respects report type context
steps: Verify summary includes relevant details for claims

description: AI summary for construction inspection
steps: Verify summary organizes by inspection areas

description: User can regenerate AI summary
steps: Add more entries to the report
Verify confirmation that current summary will be replaced
Verify new summary includes new entries

description: User can edit AI summary
steps: Verify regenerate would overwrite edits (with warning)

description: AI processes multiple entries in batch
steps: Verify progress indicator shows X of Y
Verify all entries now have AI descriptions

description: AI processing can be queued for later
steps: Note that AI generation is unavailable
Verify entry marked for AI processing when online

description: User can disable automatic AI suggestions
steps: Verify AI description is not auto-generated

description: AI respects user's language preference
steps: Set app language to German (or other language)

description: PDF generation includes AI content
steps: Create report with AI descriptions and summary
Verify AI summary appears in PDF
Verify transcriptions included for audio entries

description: AI identifies and flags safety concerns
steps: Capture photo with visible safety hazard
Verify description mentions potential safety concern
Verify safety concerns highlighted in report summary

description: AI features unavailable offline with clear message
steps: Navigate to Entry Detail for photo
Verify message that AI features require internet
Verify option to queue for later
Verify entry remains usable without AI

description: Queued AI tasks process when online
steps: Queue multiple AI tasks while offline
Verify automatic processing of queue begins
Verify all queued items eventually processed

description: AI processing shows clear loading state
steps: Verify button is disabled during processing
Verify cancel option available for long operations

description: AI content visually distinguished from user content
steps: Verify subtle visual indicator (icon, badge, or style)
After user edits, verify indicator changes or removes

description: Transcription displays with timestamps
steps: View transcription for audio or video entry
Verify timestamps shown alongside text segments
Verify audio/video jumps to that position

description: AI API failure shows appropriate error
steps: Verify entry remains usable without AI

description: AI timeout handled gracefully
steps: Verify option to retry or cancel
Verify no duplicate processing if retry

description: Unsupported content type shows clear message
steps: Attempt AI transcription on unsupported audio format
Verify clear error about unsupported format
Verify option to convert or re-record

description: Poor quality input warns user
steps: Record very quiet or noisy audio
Verify suggestion to re-record for better results

description: AI processing respects data privacy settings
steps: Verify clear explanation of what data is sent
Verify option to opt-out of AI features
Verify media is processed but not retained by AI service

description: AI does not identify individuals in photos
steps: Verify description does not name individuals
Verify description uses generic terms (e.g., 'a person', 'workers')

description: Image description completes within reasonable time
steps: Verify no UI blocking during processing

description: Audio transcription scales with length
steps: Verify processing time scales reasonably with length

description: Report summary generation scales with entries
AI descriptions are factually accurate
steps: Verify descriptions match visible content only

description: AI uses appropriate professional tone
steps: Generate descriptions and summary for typical report
Verify no casual or emotional language

description: AI content accessible to screen readers
steps: Navigate to entry with AI description
